articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Trump to release controversial memo
articles.description: Republicans claim the document shows US surveillance was used to unfairly target the Trump campaign.

articles.title: Polish Senate passes Holocaust bill
articles.description: The vote went ahead despite strong criticism from Israel and concerns from the US.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Was Palestinian teenager’s ‘slap’ terrorism?
articles.description: Jeremy Bowen speaks to the father of Ahed Tamimi and a member of the Israeli parliament.

articles.author: BBC Sport
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2018: Cas overturns life bans given to Russian athletes
articles.description: Twenty-eight Russian athletes who were banned from the Olympics for life have their suspensions overturned by the Court of Arbitration for Sport.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Rare 'super blue blood moon' arrives
articles.description: Images from around the world as the lunar event dazzles skywatchers.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Facebook tweaks prompt fall in user time
articles.description: Facebook chief executive Mark Zuckerberg said 2017 was a strong but "hard" year.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: MPs vote to leave Parliament during refit
articles.description: The Commons would be vacated during a multibillion pound refurbishment - although not before 2025.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Tenth Australia MP ousted over citizenship
articles.description: David Feeney says he cannot prove he renounced UK citizenship, defying constitutional rules.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Trump renews Syrians' protected status
articles.description: The US president extends permits for 18 months, but shuts out those who came after August 2016.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Blood test finds toxic Alzheimer's proteins
articles.description: The development is an early step towards a blood test for Alzheimer's disease.
